description: name of the species or subspecies (or higher taxon) for which this value was collected. Each entry must be precisely matched with the species reference list. No synonyms allowed.
original character string provided as species name by the data owner (kept for reference only)
the unique identifier of the trait following the thesaurus of traits available on BExIS
the name of the trait following the thesaurus of traits available on BExIS
the name of the trait as used by the data provider (kept for compatibility on provider side)
the measured raw value or factor level for this species trait. Numerical values must use the correct unit. Factor levels  must be compliant with the thesaurus of traits.
the unit as defined in the thesaurus of traits.
the measured raw value or factor level for this species trait as measured and provided by the author.
